ygData.subject: prices?
ygData.msgSnippet: Any of you know what the going rate is on the Shimmering Orb?  I don t feel like camping out for that bad boy so I think I ll just buy it. :) What about that
ygData.messageBody:
Any of you know what the going rate is on the Shimmering Orb? I don't feel
like camping out for that bad boy so I think I'll just buy it. :)

What about that Tome thing too? Looks like a book? How much would that go
for?

Why do I have the feeling I shouldn't have given away all my hand-me-downs
to younger wizards? :)

Getting lazy,
-- Lim'Dul
20 Wiz Veeshan
